summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, covering staff shifts and assignments for August 5-6, 2019. It details officer posts, shift changes, leave statuses (sick, annual), and overtime, and includes a recapitulation of staff counts. The document is dated January 25, 2019, suggesting it is a compiled or printed record.

events.title: MCC Daily Staff Assignments
events.description: Routine daily assignment and shift management for correctional staff at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

keyFacts: This is a staff roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for August 5-6, 2019.
The document records detailed shift assignments, posts (e.g., CONTROL, SHU, VISIT, ESCORT), leave statuses (Sick Leave, Annual Leave, LWOP, AWOL), and overtime/comptime occurrences.
A recapitulation shows total Correctional Services Staff: 113, Non-Correctional Services Staff: 10, Overtime Occurrences: 30 for the period.
The document is dated January 25, 2019 (7:21:30 AM - 7:21:35 AM), indicating it is a later print or compilation of the August roster data.
No specific inmates, including Jeffrey Epstein, are named in this administrative document.
